item.description:
Hey, we're doin the Grand Slam in Manchester again for Tuesday Karaoke with Avalon!

We had a great time last time, with a great Meetup crowd and the regulars there.  We got to sing a lot AND enough room for dancing too!

The food was great and good prices, especially since Killarney's just went highbrow (ie: co$t up up up) and killed the $5 Tuesday burger too.  Drinks were better priced too.  Pizza looked good and I had shrimp and great fries.  The menu (page 1, page 2) is your basic good-portioned American and Italian fare.  We were well fed and taken care of. :-)

If you come off exit 4 on the Everett Turnpike in Manchester, Queen City exit, as you approach the place, there is parking right in front, but more likely you'll park in the lot to the right of it.

Any questions, call me, Tom D'Alimonte c(603) 521-8392
item.name: Tues Karaoke w/Avalon @Grand Slam in Manchester
